effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Dispatch by 6% stacking up to 5 times. Dispatch has a 15% chance to remove Winning Streak!

Set: Roll the Bones has a 40% increased chance of granting additional combat enhancements and also applies 1 stack of  Winning Streak! for each combat enhancement granted.

Stacks applied by Roll the Bones can exceed the normal Winning Streak! maximum of 5.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Court Patron's Top Hat

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.

spells.description: Equip: Your damaging spells and abilities have a chance to deal 178,656 damage to your target. The magic school chosen is based upon your selection of socketed Khaz Algar gems.
Equip: Your abilities have a chance to call a member of the Goon Squad to attack your target for 10 sec. Gaining Bloodlust or a similar effect summons the whole crew.

name: Geargrinder's Spare Keys

spells.description: Use: Launch a Geargrinder trike to its final blaze of glory, exploding upon impacting the first enemy in its path to deal 2.5 million Fire damage split between all nearby enemies. (2 Min Cooldown)

description: I'm gonna step on the gas!

spells.description: Equip: Don the mantle of the Trashmaster.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Wings of the Amber Monarch

spells.description: Equip: Gain a high chance to follow up your attacks with a fiery gilded uppercut, dealing 448,328 Fire damage to your target. Molten gold continues to splatter to deal 124,536 Fire damage over 5 sec to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 8 enemies.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,793 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 50%.
